verbose_text: As a matter of fact, the depletion of DA by alpha-methyltyrosine or 6-OHDA before the ischemic process reduces the degree of neuronal damage [XREF_BIBR - XREF_BIBR], using an experimental model similar to ours, showing by microdialysis that the extracellular concentrations of DA increased abruptly, around 3 min after the ischemic insult, reaching a maximum value between 20 and 40 min after the insult and decreasing subsequently.
